inclusion.criterion: Stage 1 hypertensive patients, with an office Systolic BP between 140-159 mmHg and/or a diastolic BP between 9-99 mmHg , untreated or treated with monotherapy.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: None to two risk factors [smoking, hyperlipidemia, obesity , family history of cardiovascular disease].
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of any drug that may affect nitric oxide synthesis and/or blood pressure values (nitrates, antihypertensive drugs, non steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs , steroids, pseudoephedrine).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday. He has returned from an international trip few days ago and was living in a camp in Sudan for a month.
